--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"GraphDefinition","id":"9e3f07ad-cd63-4c32-9cf2-120d4d4fd987","url":"http://h7.org/fhir/GraphDefinition/example","name":"Document Generation Template","status":"draft","date":"2015-08-04T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"FHIR Project","contact":[{"telecom":[{"system":"url","value":"http://hl7.org/fhir"}]}],"description":"Specify to include list references when generating a document using the $document operation","start":"Composition","link":[{"path":"Composition.section.entry","description":"Link to List","target":[{"type":"List","compartment":[{"use":"requirement","code":"Patient","rule":"identical"}],"link":[{"path":"List.entry.item","description":"Include any list entries","target":[{"type":"Resource","compartment":[{"use":"requirement","code":"Patient","rule":"identical"}]}]}]}]}],"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:16.504+08:00"}}'

javascript Axios

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the graph definition

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the graph definition

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the graph definition

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the graph definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the graph definition

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the graph definition

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the graph definition

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Type of resource at which the graph starts

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the graph definition

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the graph definition

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the graph definition

resource.name: Document Generation Template
resource.description: Specify to include list references when generating a document using the $document operation
